1.content: Does josh get shrunken or transfomed?
1.title: First of all..

112.content:
Josh went to the house of the miranies. Theyre parents were on a buisness trip for a week and he had to look for the kids. He worked with thw miranies for some time now and he knew it was gonna be easy money for him. The mother always prepared the meals before she went and the kids knew how to heat em up. Josh work was basically just to clean theyre rooms and the house as they can get pretty messy.

All of the kids were in school so he had enough time to clean the house. First he starts with..
112.title: The miranies

1121.content: He decides to start by the youngest member of the family. Lina. He walked upstairs and opened her door. A whiff of sweat came into his nose as he saw the sheer amount of clothes just worn any lying on the floor in addition to dolls and figures. josh got a little ill as he walked in. He opened a window to let in some fresh air but the feeling was getting stronger. He then suddenly started to get smaller. He panics and held onto the edge of a shelf as his size rapidly shrunk. His hands then got too small to hold the edge as he was the size of a dust corn and started to fall. He closed his eyes thinking he would die but when he opened them he landed in..
1121.title: Linas room

121.content: By whom do you get transformed?
121.title: The burkins!

1212.content:
It was another day for josh to get some money. Today he is going to look for the children of the burkins. They lately call him alot because the husband has worries to leave his kids alone because of his crazy ex wife. Josh never met her so he isnt that worried about it. Josh went out early. He was told to be there early, that was the wish of mister burkins. He arrived at the house and knocked. Mr. Burkins opened the door "thank god josh your here. Here is the money and i will be back at 5. Keep them occupied and busy or else they cant sleep. Byebye!" He said as he entered his car. Josh went inside as he sat down onto the couch. It was always easy to keep them busy. Nick always went outside and played around for as mike loved to be inside and watch movies.

Suddenly a dull object hit him from behind and he passed out. He woke up by a lpud voice "finally...im gonna be with my kids again..all this witchcraft worked." Josh couldnt believe his eyes. He saw himself as he held him in his hand. "Now i only need to get rid of the real one...what should i turn him into.."
1212.title: By the ex wife

12121.content:
"Oh i know a pair of socks!" Josh heart sank as his vision got blurry and his body stretched out.
"Great all done now whos gonna get it..."
12121.title: A pair of socks

choices: He picks another pair of socks
121212.content:
The wife went up to mike's room. He was still sleeping which made it easier as she thought. She went to the drawer and opened it. Josh saw plenty of socks below him all in diffrent colors and shapes. The wife left the room as josh was in a dark place screaming for attention.

Shortly after the wife left the room josh was able to hear something im his voice "mike wake up time to stand up!" Josh could hear how mike stood up. The loud noise of his stomping frightened him. Mike opened the sock drawer and never before was josh so scared in his life seeing the brown haired boy in massive size looking down to you....
121212.title: Mike

1212121.content:
Mike's POV

"Huh since when do i have these socks. Welp who cares" mike thought to himself as he grabbed josh. "Hmm they feel so..cheap" mike mumbled to himself "MIKE, NICK BREAKFAST IS READY" screamed the fake josh from the kitchen. Mike hurried up and took the socks on. He walked to the kitchen and sat down. The fake josh placed some eggs and bacon on his plate and said "today we are going on a hike! We all could use some fresh air." Mike got big eyes and got excited "a hike? Yesss i wasnt on a hike for ages!" He eats up quickly and stood up again. "Im gonna make myself ready!" He went back into his room "which shoes will i wear..."
1212121.title: He picks josh

122.content:
It was a normal day for josh. He was in the house of the miranies to babysit lina mina and nina. It was nice and quite at the moment because the kids werent at home. Lina was by a friend of there mother, mina and nina played outside the room. Josh decides to make their rooms whilst theyre gone. It was one of the task the mother told him to do.

Josh went to clean...
122.title: The miranies

123.content:
Josh got woken up by the sound of heavy rock music. It was day 3 of watching over the children of the whistletons. It was truly a challenge as they are just annoying and frustrating to look after them. Tommy was always sneaking out at night or listening to rock music with full volume. Meanwhile stacy was just a brat who always complains about everything she can. Josh didnt even wanna think about the hygene of these teens. Making the laundry wouldnt be possible without a mask to be honest. If he wouldnt clean theyre rooms they would just sufficate in theyre own stench and clothes.

Josh put a pillow over his head and tried to sleep again. It only took seconds till he passed out again. After he woke up again he felt very weird. He couldnt move or scream. He starts to panic s he now was...
123.title: The whistletons

123231.content: Josh looked around. It was dark and cold where he was. He couldnt hear a single sound until suddenly, from outside of the room in the distance you heard footsteps. As the door openes the person turned on the light as you saw it was...
123231.title: A toilet

1232311.content: Josh saw a huge tommy infront of him. He had headphones on and was listening to some music. He opened "the lid" that was actually his upper part of his mouth as he pulls down his pants. "Tommy you cant be serious its me! Josh! What the hell are you do-!" Tommy already aimed his dick in josh's mouth as he was emptying his bladder in your mouth. The salty bitter taste of his piss filled his mouth. It was disgusting and it felt like an eternity till it ended
1232311.title: Tommy

info.brief_description: Josh was watching over the children of a family but then he transformed/shrunk
info.description:
Josh was a 16 year old boy who is a baby sitting for some families to get some cash, but this time he has a bad feeling..

The families:

The burkins:
A nice family with 2 boys nick(14year old) and mike(13 year old)

The miranies:
a chinese family with 3 girls. Lina (9 years old) mina (12 years old) and nina( 16 years old)


The whistletons:
The parents were nice but theyre two teenies stacy( 17 years old) and tommy (18 years old) are mean annoying brats
